content.text:
# List of Ondonga kings

This is a list of the kings of the Ondonga people, a Namibian subtribe of the Owambo. The kingdom was founded in 1650. Since then there have been 18 kings. The kings reside at a Royal Homestead in a village of their choice with Onamungundo having been a royal seat for more than 2 kings.
{| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; background:#FFFFF3"
|-
| style="background:#BBA3D1;" colspan=5 |Kings of Ondonga
|-
!width=20 style=background:#E1E1D5| No.
!width=280 style=background:#E1E1D5| Name
!width=120 style=background:#E1E1D5| In power
!width=150 style=background:#E1E1D5| Location of court
!width=120 style=background:#E1E1D5| Note, reference
|-
| 1. || align=left| Nembulungo lyaNgwedha || ±1650–1690 || ||
|-
| 2. || align=left| Shindongo shaNamutenya gwa Nguti || 1690–1700 || ||
|-
| 3. || align=left| Nangombe yaMvula || 1700–1750 || Oshamba ||
|-
| 4. || align=left| Nembungu lyAmutundu || 1750– ca. 1820 || Iinenge ||
|-
| 5. || align=left| Nangolo dhaAmutenya || ca. 1820–1857 || Ondonga ||
|-
| 6. || align=left| Shipanga shaAmukwiita || 1857–1859 || ||
|-
| 7. || align=left| Shikongo Kalulu || 1859–1874 || Omandongo ||
|-
| 8. || align=left| Kambonde I kaNankwaya || 1874–1883 || Onamungundo ||
|-
| 9. || align=left| Iitana yaNekwiyu || 1883–1884 || ||
|-
| rowspan = 2 | 10. || align=left| Kambonde II kaMpingana (Western Ondonga) || 1884–1909 || Onamayongo Olukonda ||
|-
| align=left| Nehale lyaMpingana (Eastern Ondonga) || 1885–1908 || Oshitambi (Okaloko) ||
|-
| 11. || align=left| Kambonde III (Eino Johannes) kaNgula || 1909–1912 || ||
|-
| 12. || align=left| Nambala (Martin Elifas) yaKadhikwa || 1912–1942 || Ondjumba ||
|-
| 13. || align=left| Eino Johannes Kambonde kaNamene || 1942–1960 || Okaloko ||
|-
| 14. || align=left| Martin Ambala Ashikoto || 1960–1967 || Ontananga || (deposed)
|-
| 15. || align=left| Paulus Elifas || 1967–1970 || Omwandi ||
|-
| 16. || align=left| Filemon yElifas lyaShindondola || 1970–1975 || Onamungundo ||
|-
| 17. || align=left| Immanuel Kauluma Elifas || 1975–2019 || Onamungundo ||
|-
| 18. || align=left| Fillemon Shuumbwa Nangolo || 2019– || Onambango ||
